title: The importance of truthful and relevant news is greater than ever
description: The access of information as well as disinformation in a digitalized world is greater than ever. Issues regarding truth and reliability impact politics, society and government and emphasizes the need for collaboration and it increases the importance of truthful and important news.
extendedDescription: In a globalized world we are all targets of information from sources that we have no chance of verifying; this applies to administrations and authorities as well as ordinary citizens. How do editors cope with the increasing challenge of battling disinformation? Is there useful solutions that everyone can benefit from? In this seminar we will listen to ideas about truth and trust from different perspectives. Meet Craig Silverman at BuzzFeed, the influential site that target a young and curious audience and Claire Wardle, who is Executive Director of the non-profit organization First Draft who uses genuine research for cross-border collaborations regarding truth and trust.
